entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending after midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Snow level 700 metres. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers in the morning. Clearing late in the afternoon. Snow level 700 metres. Fog patches developing late in the afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h. High plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Fog patches dissipating overnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Tuesday 27 December 2022
